ComicInfo.Summary: Alex Elder is angry and confused. He is adapting to his new vampire condition, discovering that he possesses powers beyond his imagination. Now he is ready to explore a new world hiding in the shadows--and to take on the guys responsible for his death, the "Jelly-Bats" gang, only this time things have changed!
ComicInfo.Title: Unlife Story
